content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to confidential information and could not predict with certainty whether Mitsubishi will transition to only producing electric vehicles in the future. However, many car manufacturers around the world have announced plans to shift towards electric vehicles as governments around the world impose stricter emissions regulations, and consumers increasingly demand more environmentally friendly cars.

Mitsubishi could follow this growing trend by expanding its electric vehicle lineup, and it is possible that they may eventually transition to producing only electric vehicles. However, such a decision would depend on several factors, such as technological advancements, the availability of resources needed to produce electric vehicles, market demand, and regulatory requirements.

In conclusion, while Mitsubishi has a history of developing electric vehicles, only time will tell whether the company will ultimately transition to only producing electric vehicles.
